attributes.action: scrap the olympic games due to costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: scrap the olympic games due to the huge costs,the goverment should put money into much better causes.

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions on this issue. Please consider signing one of those, rather than creating another.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympic+games
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympics
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
